text: @SecBernhardt @TrumpWarRoom @FBI Situation today: Coronavirus not under control, Economy smashed, Millions of unemployed, Every day protest in the cities. President doing more or less nothing. PRESIDENT + FOX NEWS ESCALATING further in an aggressive way, dividing our nation in order to keep power.
